item.title: [COLOR yellow] Canales Arenavision Selecciona un Canal [/B] por Acestreams [/COLOR]

regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream/13137.html'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://vipracing.info/channel/canal-2' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('tambor = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] tokenpage = re.findall('firme = "\/(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

regex.name: m3u8
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5

regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream/23283.html'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://elgoles.ru/11-15/' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('tambor = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] tokenpage = re.findall('firme = "\/(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

regex.name: lista
regex.expres: acestream:\/\/(.*?)">(.*?)< https://acestreamsearch.com/en/index.php cn=$doregex[search] https://acestreamsearch.com/en/index.php keep-alive */* XMLHttpRequest

regex.name: search
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmc import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() d = dialog.input('Buscar Canal: ejemplo: Sky Sports', type=xbmcgui.INPUT_ALPHANUM).replace(" ", "+") return d

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Liga ', ['LA LIGA', 'LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'COPA DE ESPAÑA', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA']) lists = ['SPANISH LA LIGA', 'SPANISH LA LIGA 2', 'PREMIER LEAGUE', 'UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE', 'SPANISH CUP', 'BUNDESLIGA', 'FRANCE LIGUE 1', 'PORTUGAL A LIGA', 'EFL CUP', 'COPA LIBERTADORES', 'COPA SUDAMERICANA', 'USA MLS', 'COLOMBIA PRIMERA', 'MEXICO LIGA MX', 'MEXICO COPA MX', 'CHILE LEAGUE', 'ARGENTINA SUPERLIGA'] return lists[ret]
